snippet.title: Untale: King of Revinia - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Untale: King of Revinia is a realistic visual novel of medieval genre. You will be glued to the unfolding plot of this interactive story filled to the brim with unpredictable twists and unique game mechanics (participate in tournaments; explore the royal scion's mind; dispense justice… and it is far from all…) See you in the world of Revinia!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1324830/Untale_King_of_Revinia/?beta=0 - our steam page

https://twitter.com/MonumentPoint - our twitter
